meanings.definition: A punctuation mark (‽) used to combine the functions of a question mark and an exclamation point.
meanings.sent1: The interabang at the end of the sentence showed excitement and asked a question at the same time.
meanings.sent2: I love using the interabang in my writing to express surprise and curiosity.
meanings.sent3: When the interabang appeared in the text, it was like a punctuation party!
meanings.sent4: Her expression was like an interabang, a mix of wonder and enthusiasm.
meanings.sent5: The interabang stood out on the page, making the sentence pop with emotion.

meanings.definition: To use the interabang punctuation mark in writing.
meanings.sent1: She interabanged her sentences to add both a question and an exclamation.
meanings.sent2: Interabanging your writing can make it more engaging and expressive.
meanings.sent3: He interabangs his emails to make them more interesting for the readers.
meanings.sent4: The author interabanged the dialogue, making it lively and dynamic.
meanings.sent5: Interabanging the text with the mark can create a unique tone and style.
